session_id.description: The unique ID of the overall session.

content_asset_id.description: Asset Id of the video playing/about to be played

content_pod_id.description: Pod Id of the video playing/about to be played

description.description: Short description of the video content.

keywords.description: Arbitrary keywords/tags that describe/categorize the content.

genre.description: The genre of the content, ie. ‘comedy’, ‘action’.

program.description: The name of the program, show, etc. of the content if applicable.

publisher.description: The content creator, author, producer, or publisher.

position.description: Position of product in the list

total_length.description: Total duration of the playback in seconds

channel.description: The channel in which the video content is playing

full_episode.description: true if content is a full episode and false otherwise.

livestream.description: True f the playback will be a livetream

airdate.description: ISO 8601 Date String for the original air date or published date.
